DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine how effective preemptive tenofovir therapy is in preventing the re-activation of Hepatitis B infection, in patients who are receiving rituximab-based chemotherapy for Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma. The rate of re-activation will be compared between patients who receive preemptive tenofovir and patients who receive tenofovir as needed.
